item.title: Emote id's
item.dc:creator: @sarah_mx sarah_mx
item.description:
@sarah_mx wrote:

Alright pushy, here.

0x357		Yes Emote
0x358		No Emote
0x359		Think Emote (must remove weapon before showing)
0x35A		Bow Emote
0x35B		Angry Emote
0x35C		Cry Emote
0x35D		Laugh Emote
0x35E		Cheer Emote
0x35F		Wave Emote
0x360		Backon Emote (must remove weapon before showing)
0x361		Clap Emote (must remove weapon & shield before showing)
0x362		Dance Emote
0x468		Glass Wall Emote
0x469		Lean Emote
0x46A		Climb Rope Emote
0x46B		Glass Box Emote
0x558		Blow Kiss Emote
0x839		Panic Emote
0x83A		Jig Emote
0x83B		Spin Emote
0x83C		Head Bang Emote
0x83D		Joy Jump Emote
0x83E		Rasp Berry Emote
0x83F		Yawn Emote
0x840		Salute Emote
0x841		Shurg Emote
0x84F		Goblin Bow Emote
0x850		Goblin Dance Emote

0x178		normal dagger attack
0x179		controled dagger attack
0x183		defense
0x192		defense 2
0x1A6		100% accurate (unarmed)
0x1A7		100% aggresive (unarmed)
0x1A8		100% defend (unarmed)
0x222		open bookcase
0x26A		100% fishing with a harpoon
0x26D		100% fishing with a net
0x26E		100% fishing with a rod
0x285		prayer racharging at altar
0x2CA		100% magic teleporting
0x300		agility falling from log balance (spikes)
0x302		agility falling from log balance (water east)
0x303		agility falling from log balance (water west)
0x304		agility water swimming
0x305		agility water swimming stand still
0x307		waterfall swimming
0x326		attack
0x333		Walking
0x33B		bury bones
0x33C		climb up ladder
0x33D		eating food
0x33F	0x340	digging with spade
0x348		agility jump over wall
0x349		agility jump over and a second jump to go over
0x34C		"kruipen" - crawl
0x34D		"kruip stilstand" - non-moving crawl
0x351		agility mini game jump on hand-holds (west jump)
0x352		agility mini game jump off hand-holds (west jump)
0x353		agility mini game jump on hand-holds (east jump)
0x354		agility mini game jump off hand-holds (east jump)
0x355		agility mini game move at hand-holds (west move)
0x356		agility mini game move at hand-holds (east move)
0x362	0x284	woodcutting cut tree
0x372		thieving pickpocket from npcs
0x376		fletching knife on logs
0x380		cooking on range
0x381		cooking on fire
0x382		smithing making item on anvil
0x383		smithing smelting bars in furnace
0x456		agility mini game matrix movement
0x459		agility mini game blade fail
0x465		agility mini game falling rocks on head (means failure)
0x530		start drink keg
0x531		stop drink keg
0x547		sit on something with cape behind it (meight be chair)
0x548		sit and "krab" at the head
0x549		sit and put hand in face
0x553		fishing while fishing this emote is showed
0x554		mining (must remove shield before showing)
0x580		agility mini game blade success jump
0x581		agility mini game blade success jump standing up
0x593		running
0x595	0x317	runecrafting bind essences
0x624		falling rocks (barrows tunnel gets down)
0x628		magic slayer darts
0x641		agility werewolf course  death sliding start
0x642		agility werewolf course death sliding
0x643		agility werewolf crouse hurdles
0x646		agility skullball
0x673		praying at ecto
0x67F		maul walking & 2-handed walking
0x680		maul running & 2-handed running
0x681		maul attacking
0x682		maul defense
0x686		prayer recharching at altar if having complete book
0x718		magic teleporting
0x810		walking 2-handed and great axe
0x811		stand still 2-handed and great axe
0x812		great axe normal attack
0x813		great axe controlled attack
0x814		torag hammers normal attack
0x864		ride in the mine carts
0x8D0		cross arms
0x8D5		ride carpet (straight on)
0x8D6		ride carpet (get up to the sky)
0x8D7		ride carpet (get down from the sky)
0x8D8		ride carpet (hang to the west)
0x8D9		ride carpet (hang to the east)
0x8DA		ride carpet (go sit down on the carpet)
0x900		dead
0x906		magic casting spells
0x951		crafting spinning wheel
0x980		agility blast furnace cycling
0x981		strength blast furnace pulling for heat

0x484		possible shield defence
0x491		possible bind spells
0x490		possible rune binding
0x559		possible herb cutting (quest for own kingdom)
0x563		possible monkey madness (catched by ape)
0x603		possible riding something or somthing on something
0x712		possible pushing something
0x210		unknown spinning around (could be in water - "draaiklok")
